uielement.UIElement

Detailed Description

This class handles user interface objects that can interact with the EventManager that processes the event queue.

Member Function Documentation

def uielement.UIElement.draw (   self,
  args 
)

Many UI elements will need to be drawn, but not all.

So to simplify use, we provide a dummied-out draw function here.

Reimplemented in mapeditor.BlockUIElement, and uielement.ButtonUIElement.
